messages.content: On 6 May there is a big choice to make. It's Labour or Tory. And the Tories stand for the privileged few. They are to be trusted with our future, our country and our schools. Vote Labour. Ross Kemp

messages.title: Why we're backing Labour
messages.content: This is the most important and close election most of us can ever remember. A lot is at stake and we can't let the Tories win it again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has changed the NHS for the better.
Labour has changed the schools for the better.
Vote Labour to protect Britain's economy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's vital that Labour wins this election.

issues.economy: We all agree on one thing. It's vital that Labour wins this election. Because if we make a mess of the economy now, we are in deep trouble.
issues.education: The last 13 years Government has changed things for the better for ordinary people and our schools and hospitals have been improved. There are three times more support for families and good news.
issues.health: Labour has changed the NHS for the better.

endorsements.endorsement: "David Cameron tells us that the Conservatives have changed, that they are no longer the 'nasty party'; that he wants the UK to be 'one of the most family-friendly nations in Europe', but I, for one, am not buying it."

quotes.text: We all agree on one thing. It's vital that Labour wins this election. Because if we make a mess of the economy now, we are in deep trouble.

images.caption: Images of various individuals showing their support for Labour.
